title: Hobby Boss AAVP-7A1 Plastic Model Kit with UWGS Vehicle
features: Photo-etch parts (grilles and brackets), plus hinged hatches, bow plane, and rear ramp.
Color painting guide for 2 typical vehicles - decals include gauges, equipment faces, stencils, and placards.
description: Modern fully tracked amphibious landing vehicle fitted with up-gunned weapon station (M2 .50 caliber machine gun and coaxial Mk19 grenade launcher). Features full exterior detail, plus excellent turret, driver's and troop compartment interiors. Also includes individual link track, pivoting water outlet nozzle steering deflectors, nylon cord for ramp cable.
